wikipedia_page.main: Dr John Graham MacDonald Burt FRSE LLD (1809–1868) was an eminent Scottish physician and medical author.

response: * Dr John Graham MacDonald Burt FRSE (1809–1868) President of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh
* John Graham MacDonald Burt (1809–1868), Scottish physician and author

link_mentions.page: List of presidents of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh

response: In 1867 he succeeded in his presidential role by John Graham MacDonald Burt.

In 1849 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh. His proposer was John Graham MacDonald Burt. Additionally, Thomson was a founding member of the Institute of Actuaries in 1848, and the Faculty of Actuaries in Scotland in 1856.
